greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(0) = 1; a(n) = Sum_{0 <= k < n and gcd(k, n) != 1} a(k).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
program: vector(50, n, n--; a(n)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 31 2019
results.author: _David W. Wilson_
